Perks for Your Well-Being Staying active is an important part of practicing good health. NVIDIA provides you and your loved ones with resources to keep it moving. Onsite Amenities Free classes for NVIDIA employees of all fitness levels. Classes include Yoga, Body Burn Pilates, Zumba, U-Jam, Kickbox Jam, Bootcamp, High Intensity Interval Training (H.I.I.T. ), Tai Chi, Meditation and more! The cardio fitness room offers treadmills, cross-trainers, and stationary bicycles.
Use of equipment is by reservation only via your NV Fit account. For more information, visit NVINFO > About NVIDIA > Fun & Games > Discount & Services > Health & Wellness.

Virtual Workouts A number of our fitness partners offer virtual programs to see the list access our vendor list at NVINFO > About NVIDIA > Fun & Games > Discounts & Services > Health & Wellness. Perks from Your Health Insurance Provider Cigna Discounts and Programs - Healthy Rewards Using the Healthy Rewards discount program is easy. No referrals or claim forms needed! To view the programs available, logon to your mycigna.com account and from the homepage click on Wellness > Rewards & Programs > Healthy Rewards - Discount Programs. Weight & Nutrition Management Exercise & Physical Fitness Alternative Medicine Wellness & Health Products Kaiser’s Programs & Classes Check out our healthy living programs, classes, and special member rates. Classes, support groups, and programs Community support and financial help Complementary care discounts Fitness & exercise discounts Healthy lifestyle programs Total Health Assessment Wellness coaching Kaiser’s Live Healthy Take advantage of these helpful wellness resources.

Health tools Guided meditation sessions Videos Fitness Discounts Choose a discounted membership from a gym or fitness club, including NVFIT and City Sports. For more information, visit NVINFO > About NVIDIA > Fun & Games > Discounts & Services > Health & Wellness.
